description: Swarm A vector (VFM) and scalar (ASM) magnetic field measurements interpolated at 1Hz rate.
terms: This dataset is provided by the European Space Agency and it is subject to terms condition described in https://vires.services/data_terms.

vires:parameters.name: Timestamp
vires:parameters.description: Time stamp

vires:parameters.name: Latitude
vires:parameters.description: Position in ITRF - Latitude

vires:parameters.name: Longitude
vires:parameters.description: Position in ITRF - Longitude

vires:parameters.name: Radius
vires:parameters.description: Position in ITRF - Radius

vires:parameters.name: B_MAG
vires:parameters.description: Fluxgate magnetometer, combined MAG, aligned, vector-vector calibrated and corrected for satellite disturbances, SC frame

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC
vires:parameters.description: Fluxgate magnetometer, combined MAG, aligned, vector-vector calibrated and corrected for satellite disturbances, NEC frame

vires:parameters.name: q_SC_NEC
vires:parameters.description: Quaternion, transformation: SC ... NEC

vires:parameters.name: q_MAG_SC
vires:parameters.description: Quaternion, transformation: MAG ... SC

vires:parameters.name: dB_MTQ_SC
vires:parameters.description: Disturbance field related to magnetorquer, SC frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_XI_SC
vires:parameters.description: Disturbance field related to 2nd order non-linearities, SC frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_NY_SC
vires:parameters.description: Disturbance field related to 3rd order non-linearities, SC frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_BT_SC
vires:parameters.description: Disturbance field related to temperature dependency of offsets, SC frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_ST_SC
vires:parameters.description: Disturbance field related to temperature dependency of scale factors, SC frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_SA_SC
vires:parameters.description: Disturbance field related to solar array currents, SC frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_BAT_SC
vires:parameters.description: Disturbance field related to battery currents, SC frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_HK_SC
vires:parameters.description: Disturbance field related to housekeeping data, SC frame

vires:parameters.name: dB_BLOCK_CORR
vires:parameters.description: Block correction for MAG2 and MAG3, MAG frame

vires:parameters.name: B_FLAG
vires:parameters.description: Flags

vires:parameters.name: F
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic field intensity calculated from B_NEC

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC_Model
vires:parameters.description: CHAOS magnetic model

vires:parameters.name: F_Model
vires:parameters.description: CHAOS magnetic model, field intensity

vires:parameters.name: F_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: Magnetic field intensity calculated from B_NEC, CHAOS magnetic model residual

vires:parameters.name: B_NEC_res_Model
vires:parameters.description: Fluxgate magnetometer, combined MAG, aligned, vector-vector calibrated and corrected for satellite disturbances, NEC frame, CHAOS magnetic model residual

title: GO_MAG_ACAL
